introduce.en: EOSeoul is a blockchain project from NEOWIZ, one of the big IT companies in Korea. NEOPLY, a subsidiary of NEOWIZ, is heading this project along with some of the lead engineers from NEOWIZ and a business team from NEOWIZ PLAYSTUDIO. As we have about 20 years of technical expertise fully integrated within our organisation from running a large company, we attach an immense importance to technical skills and security.
introduce.zh: EOSeoul是由韩国IT集团NEOWIZ推进的区块链项目。以NEOPLY为中心，由NEOWIZ技术部门、NEOWIZ PLAY STUDIO事业部门共同推进。我们是20年来运营大型企业的具有技术凝聚力的超级节点，尤其重视实力和安全的团队。史上最强大的区块链EOS，我们希望和大家一起为EOS发展而努力。
